headline: Revolutionizing QA: EPAM's Agentic QA™ Brings Human-AI Synergy to Software Testing
summary: As software and product development cycles become increasingly accelerated, organizations often encounter costly shortcomings in production due to limited time for thorough testing. Traditional testing approaches — whether manual or automated — are proving inadequate to meet the demands of modern systems. EPAM Systems, Inc. (NYSE: EPAM) today announced the launch of Agentic QA™, an innovative AI-native testing solution designed to address the challenges of dynamic and accelerated software and pr
